content: Quantum mechanics was born when it was discovered in the early years of the 20th century that subatomic particles can behave like waves and that light waves can behave like particles.
translations: ita:La meccanica quantistica è nata quando si è scoperto, nei primi anni del XX secolo, che le particelle subatomiche posson
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by carlosalberto (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
